item.title: Identity politics have ruined the Left.
item.description: What do you mean when you say “identity politics” exactly? Are you referring to race reductionism (people who reduce everything to race)? Are you referring to people with different backgrounds moving in self-determination? We think it’s important that we differentiate between Liberal identity politics, and Leftist identity politics. The former is a tool used by (Neo)Liberals to keep poor and working-class people divided, while the latter is about ensuring less-represented voices and concerns get heard in an international movement to dismantle Capitalism.

item.title: Now is not the time to focus on identity politics! It drives us apart when we need to be united against Trump.
item.description: Ignoring the struggles of marginalized people is exactly what Trump and fascists would want you to do, no? Source: https://blacksocialists.us/
